```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE, 
                      message = FALSE, 
                      comment=FALSE)
```

-   Librerias

```{r}
library(sknifedatar)
library(timetk)
library(tidyverse)
```

-   Datos

```{r}
emae <- sknifedatar::emae_series 

emae %>% head()
```

```{r}
nest_data <- emae %>%
  nest(nested_column = -sector)

nest_data
```

```{r}
nest_data$nested_column[[1]]
```

```{r}
nest_data$nested_column[[1]] %>% 
  
  plot_time_series(.date_var = date,
                   .value = value,
                   .interactive = FALSE)
```

```{r}
nest_data <- nest_data %>% 
  mutate(ts_plots = map(nested_column, 
                        ~ plot_time_series(.data = .x,
                                           .date_var = date,
                                           .value = value,
                                           .interactive = FALSE,
                                           .line_size = 0.15)
                         ))

nest_data
```

```{r}
nest_data$ts_plots[[2]]
```

-   Tabs 1

```{r ,echo=FALSE}
xaringanExtra::use_panelset()
```

`r automagic_tabs(input_data = nest_data, panel_name = "sector", .output = "ts_plots")`

-   Tabs 2

`r automagic_tabs(input_data = nest_data, panel_name = "sector", .output = "ts_plots", echo = TRUE)`
